comment: Avoid at all costs. Took him for SWTQA and he just used recycled slides from other professors and didn't even bother to remove their name. Was condescending when half the class tried to talk to him about issues we were having. He takes points off for ridiculous things and material covered in slides he reads from during lectures pretty much useless.

Not clear with assignments!!! Have to fix his files sent to us. Never gives a clear answer to questions. Midterm was based of nothing that was taught before. Barely curves at the end of the semester. Avoid if possible. Kutta.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Professor advised to ask questions alot, grading was not clear at first but decent choice for QA testing. But had to learn a lot on my own!!!
Professor is new, quizzes are straight from the book, midterm is tough, assignments are fair for the most part. Slide heavy, look at book for best results!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Professor Snipes is a new professor at KSU. He's a really nice guy as a person, however, his teaching ability is not the best as he strays away from the topic quite often and reads directly off the slides giving no additional information nor actually "teaches" the class. Quizzes have nothing to do with notes or class lectures, all online no webcam.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Lecture heavy
